title: 6.22 Has Brought Upon The Lag
body:
Hello,

I'll be quick and precise. Prior to patch 6.22, I had absolutely no issues with ping. The day of the patch, my lag has been insane; the ping would be 49 (normal) and spike up to 200 to about 3k ping here and there. I've never had this issue, and it's quite a nuisance. I also know of multiple individuals who have been experiencing this issue, both online friends and real. I there a fix for this?

replies.body:
Patches only change files inside of your League installation locale, so it's **really unlikely** this is caused by a patch. Large changes or inconsistencies in latency (ping) are caused by an issue between your PC and the server. I'd strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by a poor configuration on your local network.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

There are tons of people reporting the exact same problem. Something in patch 6.22 broke LoL for a lot of us. A lot of my friends stopped playing after patch 6.22 because ping spikes have been getting worse (we also all have a different provider and different OS, so it has to be something with the patch).
Actually there are a lot of posts from people experiencing lag spikes since 6.22. Including myself. Going to try and use the hextech repair kit. {{item:3152}}
There are quite a few people who were experiencing similar problems. Personally I had some FPS issues but things seem to have settled in the past few days.
